results.name: Coordination sequence for planar net 3.6.3.6. Spherical growth function for a certain reflection group in plane.
comment: Interesting because coefficients never become monotonic.
Also the coordination sequence for a planar net made of densely packed circles. - _Yuriy Sibirmovsky_, Sep 11 2016
Described by J.-G. Eon (2014) as the coordination sequence of the Kagome net. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 03 2018

Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,0,-1).
maple: f := n->if n mod 2 = 0 then 10*(n/2)-2 else 8*(n-1)/2+6 fi;
mathematica: a[n_?EvenQ] := 10*n/2-2; a[n_?OddQ] := 8*(n-1)/2+6; a[0] = 1; a[1] = 4; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 45}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 18 2011, after Maple *)
program: a008579 n = (10 - 2*m) * n' + 8*m - 2 where (n',m) = divMod n 2
